comments: Professor Maschi is amazing! I took her for Research I and I will be taking her again for II. She understands that we are all busy and have other deadlines. She is extremely helpful and provides great input/advice. Her power points were extremely helpful. I purchased the required book for the class, but never used it.

comments: Dr. Maschi is HILARIOUS! She is a very sweet teacher who appreciates each and every one of her students. She is a fair grader. She lectures on really interesting stuff and covers a lot of material. She is definitely worth taking! You won\'t regret it.
